title: WATCHMEN Episode 7 Breakdown! New Theories and Easter Eggs!
author: Think Story
comment: Red Scare eating cheetos with a fork is a mood. 🍴 PS. I know I mispronounce "calvary" all the time. I'm sorry, I'm so bad at it 😂
I feel sorry for the people that didn’t give this show a chance.  They have no idea what they are missing
Elephants store the memories because ELEPHANTS NEVER FORGET.

As a Vietnamese American, I'm genuinely impressed by the show's depiction of what Vietnam would look like if the US and South Vietnam won the War. When the show first started, I was expecting the portrayal of Viet culture to be super cringy and inaccurate. But I was pleasantly surprised by the attention to detail. They even got the South Vietnamese Flag right!
Lol to everyone who shitted on the show before it even started & the first episode, this is better than just about everything on t.v right now. This last episode was siiiiiiiiiccccccccck!!!
description:
In this video we take a deep dive and breakdown episode 7 of HBO's Watchmen "An Almost Religious Awe". We'll recap, review, point out easter eggs and details you missed of the series based off the graphic novel by Alan Moore and Dave Gibbons.

Follow me on twitter: www.twitter.com/thinkstoryYT
